subject: Adapt currency and default values for South African market
body:
- Changed currency formatter from USD to ZAR (South African Rand)
- Updated all currency labels from ($) to (R) throughout the app
- Converted all model default values to appropriate South African Rand amounts
  - One-time license: R15,000 (was $499)
  - Subscription: R1,800/month (was $99)
  - Per-seat: R450/seat (was $25)
  - Usage-based: R0.90/unit (was $0.05)
  - Tiered pricing: R520/R1,800/R5,400 (was $29/$99/$299)
  - Retainer: R90,000/month (was $5,000)
  - Managed services: R180,000/month (was $10,000)
  - Enterprise models: R9M+ annual contracts (was $500k)
  - All other models scaled proportionally using ~18:1 exchange rate

This aligns the calculator with South African market pricing context
that was already present in the LAYER_1_CATEGORIES configuration.
